allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix missing event listeners for ConnectedLineSensor

- Add ConnectedLineNum filter for Hangup events to catch incoming call hangups
- Add ConnectedLineNum filter for Newchannel events to catch incoming call channels
- Add debug logging to all event handlers for troubleshooting

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
